tweet:
#HappyMothersDay to the incredible women who have helped shaped this generation & to those who will inspire the future generation! 

You are real-life superheroes and I can’t thank you enough for the love & light you bring into our lives. #FL02 https://t.co/A6uimFQds0

Despite everything, we still have a great deal to be thankful for. On this #NationalDayofPrayer, I believe it’s important to reflect on that. 

Please join me in praying for this country & the brave individuals going above & beyond to protect & care for us all. #FL02 https://t.co/fjr9fH89Zv
America deserves more than unilateral decisions made behind closed doors. This nonsense has gone on too long. It's time to get back to work! #FL02 https://t.co/112qSxLSwE

Yesterday, I had the privilege of visiting with Paul & Claudia at Bricks & Barley Pizza. Paul & Claudia also own 5 small businesses in Bay County. 

Thank you both for taking the time to chat with me & for your hospitality! 

#SmallBusiness #PPPloan #FL02 https://t.co/GvnzOMkp0J

Today marks the start of #NursesAppreciationWeek.
 
Nurses play a vital role in our health care system. If you see a nurse this week, please join me in thanking them for their selflessness, optimism, & dedication. #FL02 https://t.co/gQtZLYpFXs

Yesterday, I had an outstanding chat with @alexsalvinews on @OANN about my experience with #COVID19 & Phase One of Florida's reopening. 

You can watch the FULL interview here: https://t.co/cPev54FiUR #FL02 https://t.co/xNE3IfDvyh

THANK YOU to the incredible men & women who protect our communities each & every day! While many of us would instinctively run from danger, these courageous individuals run toward it. Their selfless sacrifice & bravery are appreciated. #FL02 #InternationalFirefightersDay https://t.co/YrpWZ53HT7

If you are a Social Security recipient or a veteran, TOMORROW is the deadline to add dependents under age 17. If you have dependents who fit the criteria, please be sure to fill out a non-filers form. 

You can access the non-filers tool here: https://t.co/plh5n06ptZ #FL02

A reminder for #veterans - The deadline to fill out the Non-Filer form is May 5th (this Tuesday). 

You can access the form here: https://t.co/plh5n06ptZ #FL02 #veteranaffairs https://t.co/PlflFgUynZ

Earlier this week, Tyndall Elementary School hosted a parade for students and teachers. Our teachers play such a big role in the lives of our children. I'm sure being apart has been anything but easy. THANK YOU all for what you do! We appreciate you.  #SendTeachersLove https://t.co/GbnrhHHquj

More good news - The St. Marks National Wildlife Refuge has announced that the historic St. Marks Lighthouse beacon will once again shine over Apalachee Bay on May 2, 2020. #FL02 https://t.co/0ovBd4oVa3

GREAT NEWS! The U.S. Dept of Labor has announced an additional $3,333,334 for a Disaster Recovery National Dislocated Worker Grant in response to Hurricane Michael.
This has been a priority of mine & I'm so glad we can continue to rebuild. #FL02
https://t.co/GfOSOWzgxT

Thank you, Brandon Aldridge, for your outstanding work! So many of you have stepped up to help during this outbreak, & words cannot express how truly grateful I am. 

Together, we will get through this. #FL02 

https://t.co/MSvq8GMbTf

Where there's a will, there's a way! 

This is a great idea & I'm glad to see a community come together to honor the Class of 2020. 

https://t.co/8ZiLeg8Yeb #FL02 #Classof2020

Speaker Pelosi has created a “House Select Committee on the Coronavirus Crisis,” but there are already EIGHT mechanisms to oversee the govt’s response. 

Why does she want to add her own select committee? #FL02 #COVID02

Today, the House will vote on HR 266, the Paycheck Protection Program & Health Care Enhancement Act. 

Here's what you need to know about the bill: https://t.co/MGXLkllzBQ #FL02 #COVID19 https://t.co/kwDMXSAph6

Social media can be a helpful resource to reach out to those you currently can't be with in person. However, social media feeds also contain a lot of misinformation. @fema has created a helpful page to clear up rumors - https://t.co/Tf4Gj6ShAV #FL02 #COVID19

We want to hear from you! The Paycheck Protection Program funding has been tapped out & there are still so many small businesses struggling. We must replenish this resource. Thank you, @SteveScalise for putting this together! https://t.co/jSKQDFbggk #FL02 #smallbusiness
When the #CARESAct was passed last month, I was optimistic that Congress was going to put Americans first during this difficult & unprecedented time & commit to saving our small businesses. (1/3)

The @WHO was negligent & potentially complicit in the Chinese coverup of the #Coronavirus, which has so far claimed the lives of 26,000 Americans & brought the world to the brink of economic meltdown.

Thanks, @FoxFriendsFirst, for having me on this morning! While the number of deaths has increased, the number of new cases is decreasing daily. This is a good sign, However, expanding access to testing will give us a better idea of how bad this actually is. #FL02 #COVID19 https://t.co/8SbujsAMxP

Time & time again our lineworkers have come to our rescue. I remember how hard they worked to get this area back up & running a couple of years ago. They definitely deserve our thanks & recognition.

If you have the chance today, please #thankalineworker. #FL02 https://t.co/LbtU0eajPG

Wishing you and your family a happy and safe Easter! 

May we use this time to reflect on our many blessings, and let us all be reminded of the importance of hope even in the darkest of times. #FL02 #Easter2020 https://t.co/TtDJt2T3lt

The past couple of weeks have been difficult for teachers, parents, & students. This story warms my heart! Thank you, teachers, for doing your best to adapt during these times! Our students are lucky to have you. #FL02 https://t.co/9DNdXfjHFo

Some much-needed relief for many in #FL02 -- FEMA has announced the suspension of rent payment for the months of April, May, and June for disaster survivors living in FEMA-purchased temporary housing units. Read more here: https://t.co/MJeElBKjjt #COVID19 #HurricaneMichael

More hometown heroes making a difference. Thank you, @GCSC1957, for your selflessness and service.

I'm so proud to represent this district! #FL02 https://t.co/3lIdtueIY9

Many of you might have seen the news about my recent trip to the hospital, but I believe you all should hear it from me, as well. I'm feeling great & I cannot thank you enough for all of the support. Together, we can beat this. #FL02 #COVID19 https://t.co/YSDEVO5lR3

I couldn't be more proud of #FL02! We saw many go beyond the call of duty following Hurricane Michael, & we're seeing more do the same as we continue to combat #COVID19. From the bottom of my heart, THANK YOU! https://t.co/n5GKuJuFuC

The SBA North Florida District Office will host 2 informational calls TOMORROW to help #smallbusiness owners get a better understanding of the resources available to them as they recover from the #COVID19 pandemic. More info here: https://t.co/IvEv6l8uXQ #FL02

Yesterday, #FL posted the lowest number of new #COVID19 cases since 3/30. We still have thousands of cases, but this is progress. We must keep working together to continue this trend. https://t.co/NGamUaM6Ra #FL02

Spouses are the unsung heroes of the U.S. military. Our Gold Star Spouses have sacrificed the most. Today, we recognize them for their selflessness and service to this country. Thank you!  #FL02 #GoldStarSpousesDay https://t.co/A6RKB3Uf5D

A member of my staff was kind enough to share this link she's been using to create her own face masks. I encourage you to get creative & send us photos or directions for your own DIY mask. #FL02 #COVID19 #Coronavirus https://t.co/EECZe8Lk6I

.@WeRRestaurants is offering $500 grants to restaurant employees on a first-come-first-served basis. Those that are eligible will be awarded a 1-time grant of $500 that will be disbursed directly to the applicant. Applications will open on April 2. https://t.co/my2E1Qc2mb #FL02

Here's another feel-good story to kickstart your day.

Thank you, Brig. Gen. Patrice Melancon, for going above & beyond to not only serve this country but this community! It's heroes like you that make me so proud to serve #FL02. 

https://t.co/TnBUAEOl9F

Governor DeSantis has issued a stay-at-home order for the entire state of Florida. Here's what that means for us. #FL02 #COVID19 #coronavirus 

Note: You WILL be able to get essential groceries. Please refrain from panic buying. https://t.co/oGCpS2expH

Today is #CensusDay. The Census is critical to ensuring that every American has access to the resources they need. Filling it out takes just a quick couple of minutes. 

Please take a moment to fill out yours today - https://t.co/FAY2SPCojy #FL02 https://t.co/zWEYb49kfx

Today, the Treasury Department & the IRS announced that distribution of economic impact payments will begin in the next 3 weeks.

Here's what you need to know: https://t.co/T8CHGXK2VM #FL02 #COVID19 #coronavirus

Today, we celebrate National Doctors' Day. These brave men & women are currently on the frontlines as we battle the #COVID19. Now more than ever, these hardworking individuals deserve our recognition & gratitude. 

To my fellow doctors, THANK YOU. #FL02 https://t.co/rCGci24a7m
Thank you to all of those who bravely served in Vietnam! Your courage & dedication to this country are truly invaluable. #FL02 https://t.co/9V9hNkA7ba

Today, I supported the CARES Act. This bill is not perfect & has a very large price tag. However, a crisis of this magnitude requires Congress to act swiftly & decisively. 

Watch my FULL floor speech below. #FL02 #COVID19 #coronavirus https://t.co/zdkWk1n82A

"We’ve come to understand the virus in much more meaningful and deep ways... Will it go away like a seasonal flu? It will. Will it come back in the fall? Probably." 

Check out my FULL interview with the @The_News_Herald here - https://t.co/Yz44SgPjSg #FL02 #Coronavirus
